alert.note: Alert for Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 4:12AM MST until March 01 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches with locally up to 6 inches possible on the benches. * WHERE...Utah Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected this morning, particularly across northern Utah Valley near Point of the Mountain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will spread across the area early this morning, with the heaviest snowfall across northern Utah Valley north of Orem through mid morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
